elements.content: Two cyclohexane-type octadecanuclear metalla-macrocycle-based metal organic frameworks and adsorption properties† Shufang Chen Jiyong Hu Jin'an Zhao Jin Zhang Huaibin Yu Shuangcheng Zhi Junshuai Zhang and Zhanqiang Gong IIII123456Cyclohexane-type arrangement in its chair conformation.IIII789a R 1 = ∑‖Fo| − |Fc‖/∑|Fo|.bwR2 = [∑w(|Fo2| − |Fc2|)2/∑w(Fo2) 2]1/2. w = 1/[σ2(Fo)2 + 0.0297P2 + 27.5680P], where P = (Fo2 + 2Fc2)/3.Symmetry transformations used to generate equivalent atoms: #1 3/4 − X, 1/4 + Z, −1/4 + Y; #2 −1/4 + Z, 5/4 − Y, 3/4 − X; #3 1 − Z, 1 − X, 1 − Y; for 1; #1−1/2 + Y, 1 + Z, 1/2 − X; #2 1/4 − Z, 7/4 − Y, −1/4 + X; #3 5/4 − Y,5/4 − X,1/4 − Z; for 2.
